files.help:
Currently unsupported.

If you really want to get rid of it, you can try overwriting `$HOME` for MakeMKV
e.g. by creating a wrapper script `~/.local/bin/makemkv`:
```sh
#!/bin/sh
export HOME="${XDG_STATE_HOME:-$HOME/.local/state}"/makemkv
mkdir --parent "$HOME"
/usr/bin/makemkv
```
